title: Enroll Customer in Loyalty Program
description: During a support interaction, a customer expresses interest in the loyalty program. The agent needs to enroll them.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the correct customer profile open.

tasks.description: Explain the benefits of the loyalty program (e.g., points per dollar, exclusive offers).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the value proposition of the program.

tasks.description: Enroll the customer in the loyalty program.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the customer's account to enroll them in the program.
